title: Vocabulary Learning
delete_confirm_title: Are you sure to delete selected units?
delete_confirm_desc: This action cannot be undone. All words in the units will be deleted.
unit_name_exists: This unit name already exists, please choose another name
import_batch_success: Batch import successful, imported {{count}} words total
json_format_error: Invalid JSON format, 'units' field not found
json_parse_fail: JSON parsing failed, please check file content
csv_placeholder:
Or paste CSV content, format: word,meaning
e.g.
apple,apple
banana,banana
restart_tip: Restart the review from the beginning
restart_disabled_tip: Restart is only available after the first word
no_words_in_unit_tip: This unit doesn't have any words yet. Click the 'Add Word' button above to add your first word!
import_paste_tip: Or paste content into the text box below
import_parse_error: Content parsing failed, please check the format
import_brief_tip: Supports .json/.csv files. For details, click Help above.
spelling_rules: Listen to the pronunciation, then spell the word correctly. Any wrong letter will reset the input. You have 3 attempts.
help_content:
This application supports two import formats:

1. CSV Format: Each line contains one word and its meaning, separated by comma
   Example: apple,苹果

2. JSON Format: Contains complete unit and word data structure
   Example: {"units": [{"id": "unit1", "name": "Unit 1", "words": [{"id": "word1", "word": "apple", "meaning": "苹果", "mastered": false}]}]}

Please ensure the format is correct when importing, otherwise it may cause import failure.
help_csv_desc_word: Each line contains one word and its meaning, separated by comma:
help_csv_example_word:
apple,苹果
banana,香蕉
hello,你好
help_csv_desc_unit:
Supports two formats:
1. Word format: Each line contains one word and its meaning, separated by comma
2. Unit format: Each line contains unit name, word and meaning, separated by comma
help_csv_example_unit:
Word format:
apple,苹果
banana,香蕉

Unit format:
Unit1,apple,苹果
Unit1,banana,香蕉
Unit2,hello,你好
help_json_desc_unit: Contains complete unit and word data structure:
switched_to_all_mode: Switched to All mode (no words in selected mode)
switched_to_unmastered_mode: Switched to Unmastered mode (no words in selected mode)
switched_to_mastered_mode: Switched to Mastered mode (no words in selected mode)
pronunciation_delay_tip: Set delay time for auto playing pronunciation (whole seconds)
no_units_tip: Start your vocabulary learning journey! Click the 'Create Unit' button above to create your first learning unit.
no_search_results_tip: No units found containing '{{term}}'. Please try different keywords or create a new unit.
